questions.question: What is the predominant color of the text on the packaging?
What is the overall shape of the packaging that the product comes in?
What language(s) are used for the product information on the package?
What is the primary unit of weight measurement used on the packaging?
What is the weight of the product as indicated on the packaging?
What kind of graphic is prominently displayed on the product packaging?
What is the material that the packaging appears to be primarily made of?
What is the texture of the product packaging?
What is the overall style of the text font used on the packaging?
Does the packaging display a logo or brand name?
What is the orientation of the barcode on the packaging?
Are there any other noticeable markings or symbols other than text and barcode?
What is the general condition of the product packaging?
Is there any obvious damage or imperfection on the packaging?
What is the country of origin indicated on the packaging?
